changeSet.id: Script to map departments and institutes
changeSet.sql: insert into os_departments (name, institute_id) select distinct d.name, u.institution_id from catissue_user u inner join catissue_department d on d.identifier = u.department_id

update catissue_user u inner join os_departments od on od.institute_id = u.institution_id inner join catissue_department d on d.name = od.name set u.department_id = od.identifier where d.identifier = u.department_id

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Script to map departments and institutes
changeSet.sql: insert into os_departments (identifier, name, institute_id) select os_departments_seq.nextval, t0.dept_name, t0.institution_id from ( select d.name as dept_name, u.institution_id as institution_id from catissue_user u inner join catissue_department d on d.identifier = u.department_id group by d.name, u.institution_id ) t0;

merge into catissue_user us using ( select u.identifier as user_id, od.identifier as new_dept_id from catissue_user u inner join os_departments od on od.institute_id = u.institution_id inner join catissue_department d on d.name = od.name where d.identifier = u.department_id ) t on (us.identifier = t.user_id) when matched then update set us.department_id = t.new_dept_id

changeSet.id: Migration script for container data
changeSet.sql:
select identifier into @sys_usr_id from catissue_user where email_address like '$system';
insert into os_storage_containers( identifier, name, barcode, temperature, no_of_rows, no_of_cols, row_labeling_scheme, column_labeling_scheme, site_id, parent_container_id, activity_status, comments, created_by) select cc.identifier, cc.name, cc.barcode, csc.temperature, c_capacity.one_dimension_capacity, c_capacity.two_dimension_capacity, csc.one_dimension_labelling_scheme, csc.two_dimension_labelling_scheme, csc.site_id, null, cc.activity_status, cc.comments, @sys_usr_id from catissue_storage_container csc inner join catissue_container cc ON cc.identifier=csc.identifier inner join catissue_capacity c_capacity ON cc.capacity_id=c_capacity.identifier left join catissue_container_position ccp ON ccp.container_id=cc.identifier;
update os_storage_containers osc join catissue_container_position ccp on osc.identifier = ccp.container_id set osc.parent_container_id = ccp.parent_container_id

update os_storage_containers set store_specimens = 1 where ( select count(container_id) as count from catissue_specimen_position where os_storage_containers.identifier=catissue_specimen_position.container_id ) >= 1

insert into os_container_positions( pos_one, pos_two, pos_one_str, pos_two_str, storage_container_id, occupying_specimen_id) select cap.position_dimension_two, cap.position_dimension_one, cap.position_dimension_two_string, cap.position_dimension_one_string, csp.container_id, csp.specimen_id from catissue_abstract_position cap inner join catissue_specimen_position csp ON csp.identifier = cap.identifier

insert into os_container_positions( pos_one, pos_two, pos_one_str, pos_two_str, storage_container_id, occupying_container_id) select cap.position_dimension_two, cap.position_dimension_one, cap.position_dimension_two_string, cap.position_dimension_one_string, ccp.parent_container_id, ccp.container_id from catissue_abstract_position cap inner join catissue_container_position ccp on ccp.identifier=cap.identifier
